name: Brantford Flying Club
about: The Brantford Flying Club, operating the Brantford Flight Centre, is one of Canada's oldest and most esteemed flight training institutions, established in 1929. Located in Brantford, Ontario, the centre has a rich history of providing quality flight training, helping thousands of students achieve their Private Pilot License (PPL), Recreational Pilot Permit, and Commercial Pilot License (CPL). With a comprehensive curriculum that includes both ground school and flight training, students receive a minimum of 65 hours of dual training and solo flight as part of their career pilot training. The centre is known for its friendly and professional staff, seasoned instructors, and a positive learning environment. For over 90 years, the Brantford Flight Centre has been dedicated to fostering a passion for aviation and ensuring students receive the highest standard of flight education.
